spacing.comment: The spacing between the dots in the Carousel component.

width.comment: The width of the dots in the Carousel component.

height.comment: The height of the dots in the Carousel component.

selected.comment: The box shadow of the active dot in the Carousel component.

selected-bg-color.comment: The background color of the active dot in the Carousel component.

selected-bg-color-dark-bg.comment: The background color of the active dot in the Carousel component on a dark background.

container-padding.comment: The padding value for the dots container in the Carousel component.

border.comment: The border value for the Carousel component.

border-dark-bg.comment: The border value for the Carousel component on dark background.

width.comment: The spacing between the dots in the Carousel component.

height.comment: The spacing between the dots in the Carousel component.

spacing.comment: The wide viewport spacing between the dots in the Carousel component.

padding.comment: The padding value of the arrows in the Carousel component.

edge-spacing.comment: The left and right values of the arrows in the Carousel component.

spacing.comment: The spacing for the arrows in the Carousel component.

color.comment: The color of the arrows in the Carousel component.

position-breakpoint.comment: The breakpoint for the arrows in the Carousel component.

breakpoint.comment: The breakpoint for the Carousel component.

narrow-image-max-width.comment: The maximum width of the image in the Carousel component.
